encounterText: Encountered a stray comet, initial scans indicate interesting properties

success.successText: , further analysis reveals data potentially valuable for future applications

failure.failText: , unable to extract valuable data due to damage to scientific sensors

encounterText: Encountered a stray comet on a direct collision course with the ship

failure.failText: , insufficent fuel to execute full course correction, hull damage sustained

encounterText: Encountered a stray comet on a direct collision course with the ship

failure.failText: , insufficent fuel to execute full course correction, hull breach sustained, several crew members lost

encounterText: Encountered a stray comet, spectral analysis indicates a potential fuel match

success.successText: , fuel source compatible and successfully harvested

failure.failText: , sensors unable to confirm pattern match

encounterText: Encountered a stray asteroid, spectral analysis indicates a potential fuel match

success.successText: , fuel source compatible and successfully harvested

failure.failText: , sensors unable to confirm pattern match

encounterText: An electrical anomaly has triggered a power surge in the ship

success.successText: , rerouted excess power through the power sensor array, slight damage sustained

failure.failText: , surge reached scientific database and main computer core, slight data loss sustained

encounterText: Ship caught in a stream of small asteroids

failure.failText: , multiple hull breaches sustained in fuel storage section, significant fuel lost

encounterText: Encountered stream of asteroids, trajectory on direct collision with solar array

success.successText: , successfully retracted in time, minor hull damage sustained

failure.failText: , malfunction in retractor mechanism, significant damage sustained

encounterText: Sensor array struck by anomalous, high-density data stream

success.successText: , able to reroute excess data safely into the scientific database for future analysis

failure.failText: , excess data unable to be safely routed, corruption to all systems detected

encounterText: Sensor array detected anomalous readings ahead

success.successText: , able to confirm it as a sensor glitch, carried on standard course

failure.failText: , slight course correction executed but later revealed to be a sensor glitch, system diagnostic recommended

encounterText: Encountered a stray comet, not of any use for any resource or scientific purposes, but a sight to behold nonetheless
Encountered a gravitational anomaly, ship slowed down slightly, but scientific data gained could prove useful in the future
Ship caught in a stream of solar wind, speed increased at the cost of some sensor interference
Ship caught in a stream of small asteroids, minor hull damage sustained
Sensors detected strange cosmic readings, main computer had some difficulty converting readings into usable data
Crew member leaned on main propulsion reactor, guarding on the unit was faulty, crew member exposed to fatal temperature levels, technical fault repaired at once
Encountered a derelict space probe, several components still operational and able to be salvaged, integrated into systems with no difficulty
Extended use of the solar array has lead to standard wear, repair recommended
